div.div: Note: The following items are scans of signed legal documents and may not display correctly for all users. If you require assistance accessing this information, please contact CCISD at 254-547-1227 and ask to speak with the Superintendent's Secretary.

div.br:
408 S. Main Street
COPPERAS COVE, Texas 76522

div.p: The Copperas Cove Independent School District does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, gender, national origin, disability, or any other basis prohibited by law in its programs, activities, or employment practices. For inquiries regarding the non-discrimination policies, contact: Director of Human Resources or Director of Student Services at (254) 547-1227, 703 W. Ave D, Copperas Cove, TX 76522.
